author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35722. Description of original PR
>  This PR adds explicit manipulation of `HLTSchedule` when the Paths whose customization was added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35566 are replaced in `ProcessFragment`. Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35624.

#### PR validation:

None here in 12_0_X, relying on tests of #35722.
title: [12_0_X] Fix customisePixelLocalReconstruction() customize function
